locality: Yemen: Gov. Al-Mahra. north-eastern flank of the Ras Fartak SW of Nishtun, rocky slopes facing N/NE. Bare steep slopes with spare soil; no trees present, the shrubs all rather small. Alt.: 200-450 m. 20.11.1999, Leg.: P. Hein & N. Kilian PH 6592.

Yemen: Gov. Al-Mahra. southwestern flank of the Jabal Fartak, along the track from Haswayn to Nishtun. Narrow rocky wadi with rocky slopes and loamy pans from the floods. Alt.: 250 m. 06.11.2000, Leg.: P. Hein & N. Kilian PH 7909.

Yemen: Gov. Shabwa. road from Mayfah to Habban, between Assan and Lamatar. Sandstone, sinter terrace, E facing slope, with Epipactis veratrifolia, Schoenus nigricans, Adiantum capillus-veneris, very humid. Alt.: 730 m. 8.3.2002, Leg.: N. Kilian, P. Hein, H. Kürschner, Y. Ba-Muaile, M. T. Al-Nasheiri & M. A. Hubaishan YP 1364.
Yemen: Socotra. Haggier, NW of Wadi Antankatan, on path into Wadi Ayhaft, N exposed rocky slopes. Alt.: 1330 m. 13.3.2003, Leg.: N. Kilian, P. Hein, H. Kürschner & M. A. Hubaishan YP 3975.

Yemen: Hadhramout. track from Al Mukalla to Bayn al Jibal, 12 km N of Al Mukalla, 5 km N of the village Nuweina. rocky slopes and cliffs. Alt.: 500-600 m. 17.11.1999, Leg.: N. Kilian, A. F. Bin Nesr, P. Hein & M. A. Hubaishan NK 6071.

Yemen: Socotra. Ma'ala plateau, N to NW facing. Gravelly rocky limestone slopes with very sparse vegetation of mainly acaulescent or otherwise low perennials. Alt.: 650-700 m. 6.3.2003, Leg.: N. Kilian, P. Hein & H. Kürschner YP 3717.

Yemen: Gov. Hadhramout. Kor Seiban, wadi (running S to N) parallel to the vertical escarpment into Wadi Howeirah, wadi bed, slopes and rocky ridge. Kürschner & M. Reisch YP 1215.
